name: Orbits the game
description:
Space is so much fun, but so unpredictable! Asteroids and unexpected space debris can crash into your satellite at any moment. Use your skills to spin the satellite away from danger.

Unlock the ultimate space cat, a hyper parsec starship or even a super charged spinning top to keep going round and round to the far edges of the galaxy.

Game features:
• 2 play modes: single-handed or both hands on deck
• Random surprise rewards: coins, shields, charge rings and more
• Glowing minimalist design
